text: avan vanankalait tunkalinriye pataittullan. Atanai ninkalum parkkirirkal. Unkalutan pumi acaiyatiruppatarkaka avan atan mel malaikalai urutiyaka niruttinan; melum atan mitu ella vitamana piranikalaiyum avan paravavittirukkinran; innum name vanattiliruntu malaiyai poliyac ceytu atil cankaiyana, vakai vakaiyana (maram, ceti, koti akiyavarrai) joti jotiyaka mulaippittirukkinrom
